Title: News reader
Description: A simple news reader app for Windows Phone 7 using the Panorama control
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple news reader app for Windows Phone 7 using the Panorama control

Detail:
Every one must have header about the panorama control available for the Windows Phone 7 applications. But have you created an app using it? This project creates a simple news reader app using the panorama control.

The app will have two panorama screens, the first one will display the top stories, while the other will show a list of news categories for the user to choose.







For more vist my blog post News reader: Windows Phone 7 Panorama App
